text: The Gilbertese language is an Austronesian language spoken mainly in Kiribati, but also in Fiji, Marshall Islands, Nauru, Solomon Islands, Tuvalu and Vanuatu. Gilbertese is written in the latin script. ==References== Category:Micronesian languages Category:Languages of Fiji Category:Kiribati Category:Nauru Category:Marshall Islands Category:Solomon Islands Category:Tuvalu Category:Vanuatu
title: Gilbertese language
